mapper.select: select sum(t.amount) as amount, sum(t.functional_amount) as functional_amount from exp_application_line t where t.header_id = #{headerId}
select t.*, eet.name as expenseTypeName from exp_application_line t, exp_expense_type eet where t.header_id = #{headerId} and t.expense_type_id = eet.id order by t.id asc
select t.currency_code, sum(t.amount) as amount, sum(t.functional_amount) as functional_amount from exp_application_line t where t.header_id = #{headerId} group by t.currency_code
